name: canvas_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webtoon.
Tool description: This API provides the largest webcomics data in the world to create a comic site/application such as webtoons.com
API description: Search for comics by term or phrase
*To load images, please check the tutorial at https://rapidapi.com/apidojo/api/webtoon/tutorials/how-to-load-images

query.description: The search term or phrase for querying comics.

language.description: The language code for results. Defaults to 'en'. Accepted values are 'en', 'zh-hant', 'de', 'fr', 'es', 'th', 'id'.

pagesize.description: The number of results to return per page. Maximum is 20. Defaults to 20.

startindex.description: The starting index for the search results. Defaults to 0.
